Package ca.ucalgary.edu.ensf380

Class TrainDisplay

java.lang.Object
ca.ucalgary.edu.ensf380.Display
ca.ucalgary.edu.ensf380.TrainDisplay
public final class TrainDisplay extends Display
TrainDisplay.java Displays a train line with the current station and the next upcoming stations
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mark Guerta, Saif Youssef
